data.title: Mobile to accelerate expansion into mobile banking
data.meta_description: banking systems,FE-Mobile Limited,mobile banking applications,FE-Mobile,Temenos,FE-Mobile,Phil Sorrell,Koen Van den Brande,FE-Mobile,mobile banking,Temenos,Swiss Stock Exchange,Temenos Group AG,banking software systems
data.text: GENEVA, Switzerland, 10th May 2010 â€“ Temenos (SIX: TEMN), the market-leading provider of integrated core banking systems, today announces that it has signed a definitive agreement to acquire FE-Mobile, a UK based provider of software solutions for the mobile banking industry. The transaction price was not disclosed.
